General.Name: Sunjuice Holdings Co Ltd
General.Description: Sunjuice Holdings Co., Limited engages in the production and wholesale of juices in China. It offers concentrated and mixed vegetable juices, protein drinks, fruit puree, fruit powder, flavored syrups, fruit extract, fruit enzyme products, fresh juices, and other products. The company cultivates, processes, manufactures, imports, exports, and sells agricultural products; and provides prepackaged foods, juice dispenser machines, and coffee and tea maker products, as well as research and development, and technical services. In addition, it is involved in the wholesale of electronic products; the provision of renting equipment; import and export activities; and drinks processing activities. Sunjuice Holdings Co., Limited was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Kunshan, China.

3.Name: Mr. Hua  Lu
3.Title: Pres of Shanghai Sense Beverage Co Ltd
